content: Perfect! This is going to be so sweet Claude, I just really am going to have to push on sales for those limit increases. Can you update the script to include the expansions you mentioned? Definitely going to need deployment so if he needs to make changes to the table structure or something as he's going he can do that, or I don't know, whatever things he would reasonably need to do to complete this phase without having to stop would be ideal. This feels SO CLOSE Claude.
